= Aerie Subscription Transport
:toc:
:toclevels: 2

== Purpose

Realtime module streams use WebSocket and SSE transports. Each event includes a
proof envelope and policy headers are required at connection time.

== Supported Protocols

* WebSocket (primary)
* SSE (fallback)

== Authentication Headers

* `Authorization`
* `X-Entitlement-Policy`
* `X-Policy-Hash`

== Reconnect Policy

* Initial backoff: 500ms
* Max backoff: 5s
* Jitter: enabled

== Event Framing

* Heartbeat: 15s
* Max batch size: 100
* Proof envelope required on every event payload
